00027     template<class value_t>class MC_generator
00028     {

00049 
00050             static bool valid(const value_type& x)
00051             {
00052                 return (x==x and x!=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity() and x!=-std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity());
00053             }
00054 
00055             /* Public constructors: */
00056             /*----------------------*/

00059 
00060             MC_generator():n_calls(0),max_w(0),max_w_eps(0),up_to_date(true),w_hist(NULL),w(0),wsum(0),w2sum(0),w3sum(0),w4sum(0),f(1),eps(0){}

00066 
00067             virtual ~MC_generator()
00068             {
00069                 if(w_hist!=NULL)
00070                 {
00071                     delete w_hist;
00072                 }
00073             }

00080             
00081             virtual bool generate()=0;

00084 
00085             virtual bool evaluate_weight()
00086             {
00087                 return true;

00093             virtual void update(){}

00097             virtual void adapt(){}

00101 
00102             value_type operator()()
00103             {
00104                 generate();
00105                 refresh_cross_section();
00106                 update();
00107                 return w*f;
00108             }
00109 
00112             
00113             virtual void refresh_cross_section(bool with_integrand=true)
00114             {
00115                 if(!valid(w))
00116                 {
00117                     return;
00118                 }
00119                 ++n_calls;
00120                 if(!with_integrand)
00121                 {
00122                     max_w=std::max(w,max_w);
00123                     wsum+=w;
00124                     value_type w2=w*w;
00125                     w2sum+=w2;
00126                     w3sum+=(w2*w);
00127                     w4sum+=(w2*w2);
00128                     if(w_hist!=NULL)
00129                     {
00130                         w_hist->insert(w);
00131                     }
00132                 }
00133                 else
00134                 {
00135                     if(valid(this->integrand()))
00136                     {
00137                         value_type y=w*f;
00138                         max_w=std::max(y,max_w);
00139                         wsum+=y;
00140                         value_type w2=y*y;
00141                         w2sum+=w2;
00142                         w3sum+=(w2*y);
00143                         w4sum+=(w2*w2);
00144                         if(w_hist!=NULL)
00145                         {
00146                             w_hist->insert(y);
00147                         }
00148                     }
00149                 }
00150                 up_to_date=false;
00151             }
00152 
00154 
00155             virtual void reset()
00156             {
00157                 w=(value_type)0;
00158                 wsum =(value_type)0;
00159                 w2sum=(value_type)0;
00160                 w3sum=(value_type)0;
00161                 w4sum=(value_type)0;
00162                 n_calls=0;
00163                 integral.value=(value_type)0;
00164                 integral.error=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00165                 integral.error_error=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00166                 up_to_date=true;
00167             }
00168 
00170 
00171             virtual const weight_histogrammer<value_t>* bin_weights(size_type bins)
00172             {
00173                 if(w_hist!=NULL)
00174                 {
00175                     delete w_hist;
00176                 }
00177                 if(max_w==(value_type)0)
00178                 {
00179                     w_hist=new weight_histogrammer<value_type>(bins);
00180                 }
00181                 else
00182                 {
00183                     w_hist=new weight_histogrammer<value_type>(max_w,bins);
00184                 }
00185                 return w_hist;
00186             }
00187 
00189 
00190             virtual value_type reduce_max_weight(const value_type& eps_)
00191             {
00192                 if(w_hist==NULL)
00193                 {
00194                     LOG(warning)<<"Cannot reduce max weight because no weight histogram has been built..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00195                     max_w_eps=max_w;
00196                 }
00197                 else
00198                 {
00199                     eps=eps_;
00200                     max_w_eps=w_hist->max_weight(eps);
00201                 }
00202                 return max_w_eps;
00203             }
00204 
00207 
00208             template<class rng_t>void generate_unweighted()
00209             {
00210                 if(!valid(f))
00211                 {
00212                     return;
00213                 }
00214                 value_type rho,x;
00215                 do
00216                 {
00217                     generate();
00218                     x=w*f;
00219                     if(!valid(x))
00220                     {
00221                         continue;
00222                     }
00223                     update();
00224                     refresh_cross_section();
00225                     rho=random_number_stream<value_type,rng_t>::throw_number(0,max_w_eps);
00226                 }
00227                 while(rho>x);
00228                 refresh_max_weight();
00229                 w=this->cross_section().value;
00230                 f=(value_type)1;
00231             }
00232 
00236 
00237             template<class rng_t,class func_type>void generate_unweighted(const func_type& func)
00238             {
00239                 value_type rho,x;
00240                 do
00241                 {
00242                     generate();
00243                     f=func();
00244                     x=w*f;
00245                     if(!valid(x))
00246                     {
00247                         continue;
00248                     }
00249                     update();
00250                     refresh_cross_section();
00251                     rho=random_number_stream<value_type,rng_t>::throw_number(0,max_w_eps);
00252                 }
00253                 while(rho>x);
00254                 refresh_max_weight();
00255                 w=this->cross_section().value;
00256                 f=(value_type)1;
00257             }

00334 
00335             virtual MC_integral<value_t> cross_section() const
00336             {
00337                 if(up_to_date)
00338                 {
00339                     return integral;
00340                 }
00341                 value_type N=(value_type)n_calls;
00342                 value_type Ninv=(value_type)1/N;
00343                 value_type result=(n_calls!=0)?Ninv*wsum:(value_type)0;
00344                 MC_integral<value_type>sigma(result);
00345                 value_type N2=N*(N-(value_type)1);
00346                 value_type E2=(w2sum-Ninv*wsum*wsum)/N2;
00347                 sigma.error=(n_calls>1)?std::sqrt(E2):(std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity());
00348                 value_type N4=N2*(N-(value_type)2)*(N-(value_type)3);
00349                 value_type N24=N2/N4;
00350                 sigma.error_error=(n_calls>3)?std::pow(N24*Ninv*Ninv*(w4sum-(value_type)4*Ninv*w3sum*wsum+(value_type)3*Ninv*w2sum*w2sum)+((value_type)1-N2*N24)*E2*E2,0.25):(std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity());
00351                 integral=sigma;
00352                 up_to_date=true;
00353                 return sigma;
00354             }
00355 
00357 
00358             value_type efficiency() const
00359             {
00360                 if(n_calls*max_w==(value_type)0)
00361                 {
00362                     return 0;
00363                 }
00364                 return (value_type)100*wsum/(n_calls*max_w);
00365             }
00366 
00368 
00369             const size_type& calls() const
00370             {
00371                 return n_calls;
00372             }
00373

00376             const value_type& epsilon() const
00377             {
00378                 return eps;
00379             }

00381             /* Serialisation: */
00382             /*----------------*/
00383 
00385 
00386             virtual std::istream& load(std::istream& is)
00387             {
00388                 std::string initflag;
00389                 do
00390                 {
00391                     std::getline(is,initflag);
00392                 }
00393                 while(initflag!="<init>" and !is.eof());
00394                 if(is.eof())
00395                 {
00396                     LOG(warning)<<"End of file reached before initial data are read..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00397                     return is;
00398                 }
00399                 safe_read(is,integral.value);
00400                 safe_read(is,integral.error);
00401                 safe_read(is,integral.error_error);
00402                 is>>n_calls;
00403                 safe_read(is,wsum);
00404                 safe_read(is,w2sum);
00405                 safe_read(is,w3sum);
00406                 safe_read(is,w4sum);
00407                 safe_read(is,max_w);
00408                 safe_read(is,max_w_eps);
00409                 safe_read(is,eps);
00410                 is>>std::ws;
00411                 if(is.peek()=='N')
00412                 {
00413                     if(w_hist!=NULL)
00414                     {
00415                         delete w_hist;
00416                         w_hist=NULL;
00417                     }
00418                     is.ignore(1);
00419                 }
00420                 else
00421                 {
00422                     if(w_hist!=NULL)
00423                     {
00424                         delete w_hist;
00425                     }
00426                     w_hist=weight_histogrammer<value_t>::create_instance(is);
00427                 }
00428                 std::string endflag;
00429                 do
00430                 {
00431                     std::getline(is,endflag);
00432                 }
00433                 while(endflag!="</init>" and !is.eof());
00434                 return is;
00435             }
00436 
00438 
00439             virtual std::ostream& save(std::ostream& os) const
00440             {
00441                 os<<"<init>"<<std::endl;
00442                 safe_write(os,integral.value);
00443                 os<<"\t";
00444                 safe_write(os,integral.error);
00445                 os<<"\t";
00446                 safe_write(os,integral.error_error);
00447                 os<<std::endl;
00448                 os<<n_calls;
00449                 os<<"\t";
00450                 safe_write(os,wsum);
00451                 os<<"\t";
00452                 safe_write(os,w2sum);
00453                 os<<"\t";
00454                 safe_write(os,w3sum);
00455                 os<<"\t";
00456                 safe_write(os,w4sum);
00457                 os<<"\t";
00458                 safe_write(os,max_w);
00459                 os<<"\t";
00460                 safe_write(os,max_w_eps);
00461                 os<<"\t";
00462                 safe_write(os,eps);
00463                 os<<std::endl;
00464                 if(w_hist==NULL)
00465                 {
00466                     os<<'N'<<std::endl;
00467                 }
00468                 else
00469                 {
00470                     w_hist->save(os);
00471                 }
00472                 os<<"</init>"<<std::endl;
00473                 return os;
00474             }
00475

00479             plot_script* plot_weights(const std::string& filename,const char* term=NULL) const
00480             {
00481                 if(w_hist==NULL)
00482                 {
00483                     return NULL;
00484                 }
00485                 return w_hist->plot(filename,term);
00486             }
